UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: OctoPartenopin: Identification and Preliminary Characterization of a Novel Antimicrobial Peptide from the Suckers of Octopus vulgaris
Literature.Author: Maselli V, Galdiero E, Salzano AM, Scaloni A, Maione A, Falanga A, Naviglio D, Guida M, Di Cosmo A, Galdiero S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(80-90% Inhibition=80±5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(80-90% Inhibition=50±2µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(80-90% Inhibition=180±5µM)
